00036 class IMatrix : public IVector
00037 {
00038 
00039 protected:
00041     int_T L;
00043     int_T C;
00044     // Useful for operator[] member function where we need to use a IVector without constructing it
00045     IVector ExportIVector;
00046 
00047 public:
00048     // Constructeurs et destructeur
00049 
00057     inline IMatrix(int_T NbL,int_T NbC);
00058 
00067     inline IMatrix(int_T NbL,int_T NbC,int_T *t);

00138 inline IMatrix::IMatrix(int_T NbL,int_T NbC):IVector(NbL*NbC)
00139 {
00140     L=NbL;
00141     C=NbC;
00142 }
00143 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00144 inline IMatrix::IMatrix():IVector()
00145 {
00146     L=0;
00147     C=0;
00148 }
00149 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00150 inline IMatrix::IMatrix(const IVector &V):IVector(V)
00151 { 
00152     L=1;
00153     C=D;
00154 }
00155 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00156 inline IMatrix::IMatrix(int_T NbL,int_T NbC,int_T *t):IVector(NbL*NbC,t)
00157 {
00158     L=NbL;
00159     C=NbC;
00160 }
00161 
00162 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00163 inline IMatrix::IMatrix(const IMatrix &M):IVector(M)
00164 {
00165     L=M.L;
00166     C=M.C;
00167 }
00168 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00169 inline void IMatrix::Empty(void)
00170 {
00171     IVector::Empty();
00172     L=0;
00173     C=0;
00174 }
00175 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00176 inline void IMatrix::ShareData(IMatrix & M)
00177 {
00178     IVector::ShareData(M);
00179     L=M.L;
00180     C=M.C;
00181 }
00182 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00183 inline void IMatrix::SetIMatrix(int_T NbL,int_T NbC)
00184 {
00185     IVector::SetIVector(NbL*NbC);
00186     L=NbL;
00187     C=NbC;
00188 }
00189 inline void IMatrix::Reshape(int_T NbL,int_T NbC)
00190 {
00191     if (NbL*NbC!=L*C)
00192     {
00193         sprintf(ERROR_MSG_BUFFER,"EasyLink error: unable to reshape a %ix%i IMatrix to %ix%ix.\n",L,C,NbL,NbC);
00194         mexErrMsgTxt(ERROR_MSG_BUFFER);
00195     }
00196     else
00197     {
00198         L=NbL;
00199         C=NbC;
00200     }
00201 }
00202 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00203 inline void IMatrix::operator=(const IMatrix &M)
00204 {
00205     IVector::operator=(M);
00206     L=M.L;
00207     C=M.C;
00208 }
00209 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00210 inline void IMatrix::operator=(int_T x)
00211 {
00212     int_T i=D;
00213     int_T* P=T;
00214     for (;i--;P++)
00215         *P=x;
00216 }
00217 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00218 inline IVector & IMatrix::operator[](int_T i)
00219 {
00220     if ((i<0)||(i>=L))
00221     {
00222         sprintf(ERROR_MSG_BUFFER,"EasyLink error: IMatrix index overflow ! %i inferior to 0 or superior to %i.\n",i,L-1);
00223         mexErrMsgTxt(ERROR_MSG_BUFFER);
00224         //ExportIVector.T=NULL;
00225         //ExportIVector.D=0;
00226     }
00227     else
00228     {
00229         ExportIVector.T=T+i*C;
00230         ExportIVector.D=C;
00231     }
00232     ExportIVector.Shared=true;
00233     return ExportIVector;
00234 }
00235 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00236 inline int_T & IMatrix::operator()(int_T l,int_T c)
00237 {
00238     if ((l<0)||(l>=L))
00239     {
00240         sprintf(ERROR_MSG_BUFFER,"EasyLink error: IMatrix index overflow ! %i inferior to 0 or superior to %i.\n",l,L-1);
00241         mexErrMsgTxt(ERROR_MSG_BUFFER);
00242         //return IVectorErrorValue;
00243     }
00244     if ((c<0)||(c>=C))
00245     {
00246         sprintf(ERROR_MSG_BUFFER,"EasyLink error: IMatrix index overflow ! %i inferior to 0 or superior to %i.\n",c,C-1);
00247         mexErrMsgTxt(ERROR_MSG_BUFFER);
00248         //return IVectorErrorValue;
00249     }
00250     return *(T+l*C+c);
00251 }
00252 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00253 inline int_T IMatrix::NbL(void)
00254 {
00255     return L;
00256 }
00257 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00258 inline int_T IMatrix::NbC(void)
00259 {
00260     return C;
00261 }
00262 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00263 inline void IMatrix::Printf(char * Format)
00264 {
00265     printf("[");
00266     for (int_T i=0;i<D-1;i++)
00267     {
00268         printf(Format,T[i]);
00269         if (i%C==C-1)
00270             printf("\n ");
00271     }
00272     printf(Format,T[D-1]);
00273     printf("]\n");
00274 }
